thread.title: In Texas, a Meeting on Gun Violence

author: Tawnell D. Hobbs
title: In Texas, a Meeting on Gun Violence
text:
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott on Tuesday held the first of three round-table discussions to address school gun violence, where the conversation included identifying students who might be mentally troubled, installing metal detectors in schools and arming teachers.
Mr. Abbott asked a room of elected officials, school administrators and public safety officials to find ways to keep students safe in school four days after the killing of 10 students and teachers at Santa Fe High School in south Texas. Solutions could require executive... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
